Entries.Indoor_Day_0: Hmm? Sorry, sometimes I get so lost in thought that I don't even realise what I'm doing.
Entries.Indoor_Night_4: I'm really starting to love this old house. It's so cosy at night.#$e#Mum's done a great job improving the place.$h
Entries.Outdoor_4: I never realised the amount of care and planning necessary to run a farm! It's a lot like working in the laboratory.
Entries.funReturn_Maru: Mum and Dad are doing just fine. Their routine is still the same, even with me gone. How was your day?
Entries.spring_2: So, what's your strategy for optimising the farm this year?
Entries.fall_3: Autumn always reminds me of going out woodcutting with my mum... it might be that smell of freshly cut wood and sap.
